name: Deus Ex Machina Clone (RonojoyMitra)
description:
The WebGL build has a few issues, namely sync issues for the audio and making it full screen messes up the aspect ratio. The Mac and Windows builds work without these issues. 

Mac and Windows builds since the timer I had to switch states wasn't working in the WebGL build

QABV - Controls

Pause Button for audio track at the bottom of the screen.
